itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday May 23, 2014
teaser: Can London hang on to its position as the heart of the global economy?
contentencoded: London is heart of the global economy, according to a new survey out this week. But can the city hang on to its position? The BBC’s Andrew Walker joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss how U.K. politicians are working to attract business from the growing economies of China and the Muslim world. Click on the audio player above to hear more.

title: Why London wants Chinese and Muslim investment
description: Can London hang on to its position as the heart of the global economy?
